channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【How to build customized Power BI dashboards with user insights data in External ID】如何使用外部 ID 中的用户见解数据构建自定义 Power BI 仪表板
item.description: 【The user insights feature in Microsoft Entra External ID, now generally available, provides valuable metrics on user behavior through Microsoft Graph APIs and dashboards in the Microsoft Entra admin center. This blog post will guide you through building a customized Power BI dashboard using user insights to analyze metrics like total user count, active users, and MFA usage.】Microsoft Entra 外部 ID 中的用户洞察功能现已全面推出，它通过 Microsoft Entra 管理中心中的 Microsoft Graph API 和仪表板提供有关用户行为的有价值的指标。这篇博文将指导您使用用户洞察构建自定义的 Power BI 仪表板来分析用户总数、活跃用户和 MFA 使用情况等指标。

item.title: 【New IDE features in Visual Studio v17.11】Visual Studio v17.11 中的新 IDE 功能
item.description: 【In Visual Studio 2022 v17.11, you’ll discover several new features that address specific issues developers have reported. These updates don’t belong to a distinct category, but we’re dedicated to sharing them with you in this blog post. You can download the update and view the comprehensive release notes for full details.】在 Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 中，您将发现一些新功能，可以解决开发人员报告的特定问题。这些更新不属于不同的类别，但我们致力于在这篇博文中与您分享。您可以下载更新并查看全面的发行说明以获取完整详细信息。

item.title: 【The Microsoft/IBM joint development was built on mutual respect, wait, is respect the right word?】Microsoft/IBM 联合开发建立在相互尊重的基础上，等等，尊重这个词正确吗？
item.description: 【Maybe it's some other word.】也许是别的词。

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (August 2024)】Azure SDK 版本（2024 年 8 月）
item.description: 【The Azure SDKs release every month. This post includes the month's highlights and release notes.】Azure SDK 每月发布一次。这篇文章包括本月的亮点和发行说明。

item.title: 【C# Dev Kit update brings enhanced Razor IntelliSense, Project Status, and New Config Options】C# 开发套件更新带来了增强的 Razor IntelliSense、项目状态和新的配置选项
item.description: 【Boost your dev workflow with the C# Dev Kit August 2024 release, which brings enhanced Razor IntelliSense, updated Project Status Bar, and new Project Configuration Options!】使用 2024 年 8 月版本的 C# 开发工具包加快您的开发工作流程，该工具包带来了增强的 Razor IntelliSense、更新的项目状态栏和新的项目配置选项！

item.title: 【.NET Community Toolkit 8.3 is here! NativeAOT, .NET 8 enhancements, and more!】.NET 社区工具包 8.3 现已推出！ NativeAOT、.NET 8 增强功能等等！
item.description: 【We're happy to announce the official launch of the .NET Community Toolkit 8.3 release, featuring .NET 8 and NativeAOT support, performance improvements, several bug fixes and enhancements, and more!】我们很高兴地宣布正式推出 .NET Community Toolkit 8.3 版本，其中包含 .NET 8 和 NativeAOT 支持、性能改进、多项错误修复和增强功能等等！

item.title: 【Windows Terminal Preview 1.22 Release】Windows 终端预览版 1.22 发布
item.description: 【Hello friends, we have a new Windows Terminal Preview release! Windows Terminal Preview 1.22 is a large release that contains new features such as Sixel image support (a LARGE community contribution!), Grapheme Cluster Support, the Snippets Pane, Quick Fixes in CMD,】朋友们大家好，我们发布了新的 Windows 终端预览版！ Windows Terminal Preview 1.22 是一个大型版本，包含新功能，例如 Sixel 图像支持（社区贡献很大！）、Grapheme Cluster 支持、代码片段窗格、CMD 中的快速修复、

item.title: 【Introducing the Pinecone .NET SDK】Pinecone .NET SDK 简介
item.description: 【Get started building AI applications in .NET using the Pinecone Vector DB and the Pinecone .NET SDK.】开始使用 Pinecone Vector DB 和 Pinecone .NET SDK 在 .NET 中构建 AI 应用程序。

item.title: 【Retrieval Augmented Generation with Azure SQL】使用 Azure SQL 检索增强生成
item.description: 【Retrieval Augmented Generation, or RAG, is one of the hottest topics at the moment as it opens up the possibility of interacting with data using natural language, which is a long-time dream finally coming true. It is very likely that a lot of your data is already stored or will be stored in Azure SQL,】检索增强生成（RAG）是目前最热门的话题之一，因为它开启了使用自然语言与数据交互的可能性，这是一个长久以来的梦想终于实现了。您的大量数据很可能已经存储或将存储在 Azure SQL 中，

item.title: 【Reliable Web App – Reliability Patterns】可靠的 Web 应用程序 – 可靠性模式
item.description: 【(Only got 5 minutes? The completed example is available here) As applications migrate to the cloud, they must be designed to handle inevitable failures gracefully. Network issues, service outages, and other transient faults are common in distributed systems. Without proper handling mechanisms,】（只有 5 分钟？完整的示例可在此处获取）当应用程序迁移到云时，它们的设计必须能够优雅地处理不可避免的故障。网络问题、服务中断和其他瞬时故障在分布式系统中很常见。如果没有适当的处理机制，
